question:
Nowadays animal experiments are widely used to develop new medicines and
to test the safety of other products. Some people argue that these
experiments should be banned because it is morally wrong to cause animals
to suffer, while others are in favor of them because of their benefits to
humanity. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: In the modern era, A valuable discussion going on the society, where some people demand to stop killing wild animals for testing drugs others have the opposite view. In this essay, I would shed light on both sides and justify my view.

On the one hand, Individuals in the sides of animal right believed that It,s totally unfair because all the species have the right to live on the earth. For example, Most of the medicines test on the mouses and monkeys and in some religions in India these animals have huge respect. Although, People give respect to some species as a god.  Moreover, Animals also have felling likewise pain or fear. So, Using wildlife for providing benefits to human life's totally unjustified. The recent studies show that each year around thousand of rats has been used for medicines purpose know these species is in the danger of losing.

On the other hand, It is an irrefutable fact that medicines test on animals have huge benefits on human life because It saves citizens from many unwanted side effects. For Instance, Covid-19 vaccine directly tested on humans which kill some people all around the globe. So, scientists have no better  opposition then animal to test new drugs. Furthermore, Animals body have the ability to absorb effects of new medicine as compared to human beings because the university of Toronto did great research and found that monkeys have some type to unique power to gain the high doses of the new chemical in their body. Which helps doctor or researcher to create new drugs.

To conclude, I would like to state that there are both views of an above-said question. However, If I have to choose one then I am in the favour of benefits to humanity from animals experiments because this the best way to test new drugs yet.

error_list.error_des: The verb have is usually followed by the to-infinitive, not by a gerund. Change felling to the to-infinitive form.
